name: Rose City Revenge: The Beginning
description:
Jane's father is seriously injured during an attack. With crime out of control and realizing that nothing will be done, Jane decides to track down the criminals. This will result in going through the criminal underworld in Rose City and taking down bosses one by one along the way.

Arcade style gameplay with an RPG twist.

Fight your way through the city, each level set is a different section of the city. Encounter and defeat crime bosses at the end of each level set.

Gain XP by defeating enemies and upgrade your characters fighting style.

Rose City Revenge has over 40 levels with some cool and unique features added to the traditional brawler format. Some of these features include, inventory, maps and side quests. The game also features unlockable characters, multiplayer mode, special weapons and items.
